node.title: Seagull patrols at Opera House extended for two years after eateries hail success
node.alt: a dog standing on the forecourt of the opera house
node.description: Businesses and diners come out in defence of the initiative to hire dogs to scare away seagulls on the forecourt of Sydney's biggest attraction as Labor brands it an "extravagant expenditure".
node.content:
["Businesses and diners have come out in defence of the initiative to hire dogs to scare away seagulls on the forecourt of Sydney's biggest attraction.", "The birds, known to frequent the restaurant strip of the Sydney Opera House, have been on the run since dogs have started patrols.", "Dog training company\u00a0Mad Dogs and Englishmen have been contracted to maintain the patrols for more than four years using 12 specially trained border collies and kelpies.", "Owner and dog trainer\u00a0James Webb said the dogs have been working at the lower concourse seven days a week during peak dining times.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"Financially it pays for itself because of the amount of money the restaurants save,\" Mr Webb said.", "", "
Mr Webb said the\u00a0initiative pays for itself and has been a success for the restaurants.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Jacquie Manning)
", "\"The dogs love it, and we've refined our training over the years to where it is now.\"", "Mr Webb was awarded a further two years on the contract to continue the patrols, totalling $376,380 split between the Opera House, Opera Bar, and Opera Kitchen.", "Opposition Minister for Arts\u00a0Walt Secord said the payment amount is \"ludicrous\".", "\"My dog would do it for free,\" Mr Secord said.", "\"In these tough economic times, it's tough for the government to get behind $400,000 to shoo away seagulls. It\u2019s about the extravagant expenditure.\"", "An Opera House statement said\u00a0the dog patrols are at no cost to taxpayers, costing the venue $65,000 a year.", "And diners couldn't be more supportive of the program.", "\"It's unusual and unique and you see dogs doing all sorts of things, but I've never seen a dog trained to chase seagulls. It's fascinating and I think it's awesome,\" one diner said.", "Another diner told the ABC: \"Last time I came here, me and my mum came to eat and we were attacked by birds and we had to leave because I couldn't deal because it was really bad.", "\"So at least with the dogs here it's better for everyone so they can actually enjoy their food.\"", "The dog training company was first approached by the Opera House to conduct a trial patrol in 2018\u2014 and it was found to be a success.", "\"No one was doing it with trained dogs, we had a trial for a day and found it was great to keep them away while we are other \u2014\u00a0when we leave, the seagulls come back in force,\"\u00a0Mr Webb said."]
